page.title: Spatial Simulation Results Overview
page.introduction: Simulation solvers producing 1,2 or 3 dimensional spatial domain results are viewed with the Spatial Results Viewer. Controls are provided for selecting variable, time-point, slice-plane, color scaling, region-of-interest (ROI), data plots and statistics. Volume data are displayed as orthogonal slices and membrane data are displayed as surface renderings. A pointer can be used to interactively find data values on single mesh points. Collections of data can be exported in various formats. Pre-defined simulation statistics and protocol image views are also available depending on user settings.

list.item: View Data tab contains the main viewer to display spatial data as orthogonal (x,y,z) slices for volume data or surface renderings for membrane data.
Export Data tab is used to select variable, time and roi data to export in movie, image, mesh, raw and spreadsheet formats.
Post Processing Stats Data tab displays compartment summary data (mean, sum) automatically generated by VCell solvers at each simulation time-point.
Post Processing Image Data tab displays data generated by Protocol Microscope Measurement definitions.
